original_title: 時代をつくった男 阿久悠物語
overview: Aku Yu was a songwriter who put out more than 500 songs in his lifetime. His songs spanned a wide genre from idol songs, enka, folk songs to songs for anime and commercials. He was called a hit maker for the many famous songs he composed which added colour to the period.
title: 時代をつくった男 阿久悠物語
